channel.title: Right click reporting/Gambling is B&
channel.description:
They added this crap into the game without a poll. Regardless of how 'helpful' it is, it's bullshit. I've accidentally clicked report dozens of times instead of trading. if this is their solution to breaking bots, then they've got another thing coming.
I don't think it was their call to remove gambling, even if it didn't exist in 2007 we still didn't vote on the removal of it. It didn't hurt anyone having flower gambling.
For more info: http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/forums.ws?317,318,945,64662048

item.title: Right click reporting/Gambling is B&
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

I somewhat support this. I do think it should be made against the rules, but trying to remove items of chance isn’t going to work out well. Players should just receive bans/mutes. Right click reporting isn’t a big deal and it’s currently in their RSC client too.

EDIT: To be honest a better solution would have been to make it sequential instead of only having one…

Read full topic

Well I didn’t know they did come up with a global rule for gambling so I don’t know why it would be our choice.

“Do you guys want to follow the global rules?” Is pretty much what you’re saying.
[/quote]They have a global rule for gambling?

According to the news post you linked it says “due to the recent global rule update banning gambling games”.
Did you not read what you linked lol[/quote]I skipped over that part

@the_elve_age wrote:

They added this crap into the game without a poll. Regardless of how ‘helpful’ it is, it’s bullshit. I’ve accidentally clicked report dozens of times instead of trading. if this is their solution to breaking bots, then they’ve got another thing coming.

I don’t think it was their call to remove gambling, even if it didn’t exist in 2007 we still didn’t vote on the removal of it. It didn’t hurt anyone having flower gambling.
